history.heading: Side Scan Sonar (SSS) or Synthetic Aperture Sonar (SAS), designed for seabed imaging and having all of the following, and specially designed transmitting and receiving acoustic arrays therefor:
history.title: Side Scan Sonar (SSS) or Synthetic Aperture Sonar (SAS), designed for seabed imaging and having all of the following, and specially designed transmitting and receiving acoustic arrays therefor:

supplement.heading: Supplement No. 1 to Part 774 - The Commerce Control List

breadcrumbs: A. “End Items”, “Equipment”, “Accessories”, “Attachments”, “Parts”, “Components” and “Systems”
6A001 Acoustic systems, equipment and “components”, as follows (see List of Items Controlled).
Active (transmitting or transmitting-and-receiving) systems, equipment and “specially designed” “components” therefor, as follows:
Acoustic seabed survey equipment as follows:
history.text:
Side Scan Sonar (SSS) or Synthetic Aperture Sonar (SAS), designed for seabed imaging and having all of the following, and specially designed transmitting and receiving acoustic arrays therefor:
Designed or modified to operate at depths exceeding 500 m; and
a.1.a.3.a. Designed or modified to operate at depths exceeding 500 m; and
An ‘area coverage rate’ of greater than 570 m 2/s while operating at the maximum range that it can operate with an ‘along track resolution' of less than 15 cm; and
a.1.a.3.b. An ‘area coverage rate’ of greater than 570 m 2/s while operating at the maximum range that it can operate with an ‘along track resolution' of less than 15 cm; and
An ‘across track resolution’ of less than 15 cm;
a.1.a.3.c. An ‘across track resolution’ of less than 15 cm;
Technical Notes: 1. ‘Area coverage rate’ (m 2/s) is twice the product of the sonar range (m) and the maximum speed (m/s) at which the sensor can operate at that range. 2. ‘Along track resolution’ (cm), for SSS only, is the product of azimuth (horizontal) beamwidth (degrees) and sonar range (m) and 0.873. 3. ‘Across track resolution’ (cm) is 75 divided by the signal bandwidth (kHz).

supplement.heading: Supplement No. 1 to Part 774—The Commerce Control List

breadcrumbs: A. “End Items”, “Equipment”, “Accessories”, “Attachments”, “Parts”, “Components” and “Systems”
6A001 Acoustic systems, equipment and “components,” as follows (see List of Items Controlled).
Marine acoustic systems, equipment and “specially designed” “components” therefor, as follows:
Active (transmitting or transmitting-and-receiving) systems, equipment and “specially designed” “components” therefor, as follows:
Acoustic seabed survey equipment as follows:
history.text:
Side Scan Sonar (SSS) or Synthetic Aperture Sonar (SAS), designed for seabed imaging and having all of the following, and “specially designed” transmitting and receiving acoustic arrays therefor:
Designed or modified to operate at depths exceeding 500 m; and
a.1.a.3.a. Designed or modified to operate at depths exceeding 500 m; and
An 'area coverage rate' of greater than 570 m 2/s while operating at the maximum range that it can operate with an 'along track resolution' of less than 15 cm; and
a.1.a.3.b. An 'area coverage rate' of greater than 570 m 2/s while operating at the maximum range that it can operate with an 'along track resolution' of less than 15 cm; and
An 'across track resolution' of less than 15 cm;
a.1.a.3.c. An 'across track resolution' of less than 15 cm;
Technical Notes: For the purposes of 6A001.a.1.a.3: 1. 'Area coverage rate' (m2/s) is twice the product of the sonar range (m) and the maximum speed (m/s) at which the sensor can operate at that range. 2. 'Along track resolution' (cm), for SSS only, is the product of azimuth (horizontal) beamwidth (degrees) and sonar range (m) and 0.873. 3. 'Across track resolution' (cm) is 75 divided by the signal bandwidth (kHz).
